Methods in net.jxse.impl.OSGi.Services that throw JxtaConfigurationException
 NetworkManager JxseOSGiNetworkManagerServiceImpl.getConfiguredNetworkManager()
          Returns the current instance of the NetworkManager if it is in a started status, else creates a new instance and configures it with the current peer configuration.

Uses of JxtaConfigurationException in net.jxse.OSGi.Services
 

Methods in net.jxse.OSGi.Services that throw JxtaConfigurationException
abstract  void JxseOSGiNetworkManagerService.setPeerConfiguration(JxsePeerConfiguration config)
          Set the peer configuration if the NetworkManager is not in a started status, else throws a JxtaConfigurationException.
